WESTBOUND
9:10
Jhe two Carriers reserve the right to alternate their services or change the
united plates Terminus without notice.
CONNECTIONS AT BALTIMORE: For convenient air or
rail connections to and from Baltimore, consult your local
raver agent or transportation ne
Airliners of Bastern Air
Lines and Pennsylvania Central Airlines and de luxe trains
of the Pennsylvania and Baltimore & Ohio Railroads offer
excellent transportation north, west or south between Balti-
more and all cities in the United States and Canada..

TRANSFERS: Take any taxi service between central points
in Baltimore and Municipal Airport. No charge in Bermuda
for launch service between Darrell's Island and Hamilton.

of baggage.

fore scheduled departure time.
